segments.content: You probably heard of [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web), allowing to render **React-Native views on the web**.
segments.sourceMdx: You probably heard of [React-Native-Web](https://github.com/necolas/react-native-web), allowing to render **React-Native views on the web**.

segments.content: **So, what about using React-Native in a Gatsby website?**
segments.sourceMdx: **So, what about using React-Native in a Gatsby website?**

segments.content: This post is a **proof-of-concept**: it contains **React-Native** and **Expo** interactive components, embedded directly into [this article](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby) (using [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)), of my [open-source](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com) Gatsby site.
segments.sourceMdx: This post is a **proof-of-concept**: it contains **React-Native** and **Expo** interactive components, embedded directly into [this article](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com/tree/master/content/posts/2020-05-11-using-expo-in-gatsby) (using [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)), of my [open-source](https://github.com/slorber/sebastienlorber.com) Gatsby site.
